‚ÄúI didn't start a band to get girls. [...] I stayed in the band to get girls,‚Äù Maroon 5‚Äôs lead singer, Adam Levine once infamously said. But being one of the biggest stars in the pop rock genre, people seemed to overlook Adam‚Äôs private life. That‚Äôs until mid-September of 2022, when an Instagram and OF model shook the internet with accusations of exploitation and infidelity with the very married Adam.

And who was left to suffer behind the scenes? A pregnant wife and their two children.

She has broken her silence . . . 

Now his past, present and future are all put under the limelight. Just how far did Adam‚Äôs secrets go?
